title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.
highlights: model library pulls from Hugging Face

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers; chat, stream, and manage local models via Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you plug any Ollama model into LangChain chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: threads, prompt templates, model management, RAG uploads, dark mode, and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI wrapper around Ollama with fuzzy-find model picker, conversation history, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline code copilot with autocomplete and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for building production-grade QA pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Spring Boot starter for enterprise apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK and CLI for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, and list models from C# / F# / VB.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) and Docker Compose examples for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, and autocomplete text.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package delivering the ollama-js SDK with 40k weekly downloads and zero native dependencies.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package on PyPI: install with pip and chat with local models in 2 lines of code.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem that wraps Ollama with ActiveModel-like interface for Rails apps wanting local LLM features.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into any channel with slash commands and role ACL.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Experimental Zig client for Ollama demonstrating http.zig and JSON parsing with 0 dependencies.
